title: The Billionaire Prize
description: I knew he was trouble. You’d think the words 'Playboy billionaire’ would have been my first warning, but I went and fell hard for Asher Young. He said he believed in me and my lingerie design business, but it turns out, it was all just a game to him. I never want to see his irritatingly-handsome face again. But how am I supposed to move on when he’s still my #1 investor? I can’t decide if I want to slap him, or kiss him senseless. Or both. Maybe it’s time the player got played… this book was previously published as part of the Billionaire Game serial. The Billionaire 1. The Billionaire Bargain 2. The Billionaire Secret 3. The Billionaire Game 4. The Billionaire Prize 5. Billionaire with a Twist 6. Billionaire on the Rocks
author: Lila Monroe
